content:
I'm glad to hear that! Podcasts are a fantastic way to make the most of your daily commute. You can learn something new, be entertained, or even relax and unwind during your daily travels. Three weeks of binge-listening is impressive, by the way! You must have covered a lot of ground in your favorite podcasts.

What do you think it is about podcasts that makes them so appealing for commutes? Is it the ability to multitask, the convenience of being able to listen on-the-go, or something else entirely?

Also, have you discovered any new favorite hosts, topics, or formats during your binge-listening spree?
